description: Update KeepTruckin vehicle trailer or tractor assignments.
permissions: Admin users can update any KeepTruckin vehicle. Non-admin users can update vehicles only when they are members of the vehicle broker organization.
side_effects: Updates tractor and/or trailer assignments; may clear relationships when empty strings are provided. If this is the first assignment from nil, it can enqueue vehicle location event creation jobs.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (KeepTruckin vehicle ID). At least one of --tractor or --trailer must be provided. Passing an empty string clears the assignment. If a tractor or trailer is set, it must belong to the same trucker as the KeepTruckin company, and assignments are blocked if the KeepTruckin company has no trucker assigned.
